properties.entry: This tool aims to generate graph. The generated stream can be directed to a file or on standard output. There are many generator types that can be listed using the --generator-type=? option.\nGeneration can be dynamic or static using --export. If dynamic, generate will produce events until iterations count has been reached or until graph node count has reached size.
average amount of nodes before stop
export the graph after the generation
Neither 'size' option or 'iteration' option have been defined.\nAdd 'force' option to bypass this protection.
The format \"{1}\" is not dynamic. Use 'export' option to export the whole at the end of the generation or use 'force' option to force the dynamic generation.
